name: Microtel Wellington
description:
Centrally located and surrounded by dining options, Microtel by Wyndham Wellington welcomes you with free WiFi, paid parking, a caf√©, modern guest rooms, self service checkin kiosk and easy access to public transportation. 

Pop into the harborside shops and restaurants along the Wellington Waterfront Walk, visit the Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, or take in panoramic city views from the Wellington Cable Car. 

Just eight kilometers from Wellington International Airport (WLG), our non-smoking hotel is minutes from Victoria University of Wellington and the Beehive.

houseRules.notes:
Check-in from 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM (Use our new Check-In Kiosk for faster check-in)
Minimum check-in age - 18
Check-out before 10:00 AM
The front desk is open daily from 7:00 AM - 6PM. Please contact us prior to arrival if you plan to arrive outside these hours.
Pets not allowed (service animals are welcome, and are exempt from fees)
Paid parking is limited and subject to availability. (this is on a first come first served basis)
Children are welcome, unfortunately rollaway/extra beds/cribs (infant beds) are not available, however we are happy for you to bring your own crib
The credit card provided in this booking will be charged either at time of booking for non-refundable bookings, or 48 hours prior to arrival unless alternate payment method has been pre approved.
A security bond of NZD $100/room is taken via credit card on arrival and is returned to the same credit card upon departure. It might take 5-7 working days for this amount to reflect into your bank account depending upon your bank.
Valid Credit Card required at the time of booking. C/card surcharges apply for Visa / Mastercard 2.5% and AMEX 3.1%
If you opt for the 'Pay Now' option to secure a discounted rate, please note that your booking will become non-refundable and non-changeable.
If you are unable to provide a NZD $100 via credit card at check-in, a $500 cash bond is payable directly to reception to hold against the room and upon check-out the $500 bond is repaid less any deductions resulting from breaking house rules.
Please call or email us for any further assistance
